mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM t_message WHERE uid = #{uid})

SELECT COALESCE(b.count, 0) count FROM (SELECT 1 type UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT type, count(uid) count FROM t_message WHERE STATUS = 1 AND is_receive = 0 AND receive_user_uid = #{uid} GROUP BY type) b ON a.type = b.type
